query.name: org.bucksiu.powershellpowerschool.api.dailyattendance
query.sql: SELECT concat('stu',st.dcid) as person_sourced_id, att.att_date as attendance_record_date, sch.School_Number as institution_code, sch.Name AS institution_name, st.Student_Number AS reference_code, st.Last_Name AS last_name, st.First_Name AS first_name, p.Name AS period_name, p.Period_Number AS period_number, atcd.att_code as att_code, ce.Ce_Code as att_code_cat FROM Attendance att INNER JOIN Attendance_Code atcd ON ( att.attendance_codeid=atcd.id ) INNER JOIN Att_Code_Code_Entity attcce ON ( attcce.Attendance_CodeID=atcd.id ) INNER JOIN Code_Entity ce ON ( attcce.Code_EntityID=ce.id ) INNER JOIN Students st ON ( att.StudentID=st.id ) INNER JOIN Schools sch ON ( att.SchoolID=sch.School_Number ) left JOIN Period p ON (att.PeriodID=p.id) WHERE ce.Ce_Code <> 'Excused' AND att.att_date = :date AND p.Period_Number IS NULL ORDER BY institution_name, reference_code, period_name
